title: Payment calculator
description: Overlooking picture perfect West 9th Street, Residence 7B is a spectacular one-bedroom home with open southern views stretching downtown to One World Trade Center.   Bathed in natural light the living room is both elegant and inviting, featuring a wood-burning fireplace framed by handsome custom wood built-ins creating both beauty and incredible functionality. The kitchen has been renovated with bespoke paneled cabinetry and updated appliances.   The spacious bedroom easily accommodates a king-size bed and enjoys the same wide-open views, an oversized closet and a bright and airy windowed bathroom . & nbsp;   This is one of only three one-bedroom homes in the building with unobstructed southern views-making it a truly rare find.   Windsor Arms is a distinguished prewar cooperative with a full-time doorman, resident superintendent , and basement laundry. Perfectly positioned on picturesque West 9th Street, the building is just moments from Washington Square Park, Jefferson Market Garden, and the neighborhood's best dining and shopping.
